name: Purr Pals
overview: Welcome to the cuddly online home of Purr Pals, the game that gives you all the cute, frisky, playful little kittens you've ever wanted. Purr Pals lets you choose an adorable virtual kitten to adopt, train, wash, pet, feed and entertain. Better still, your Purr Pal will entertain you! You'll have hours of furry fun choosing your kitty's breed, unique personality, fur and eye color and the accessories it will wear while you play. With so many different kittens to choose from, the possibilities with your Purr Pal are nearly endless. If you like kittens, you'll love Purr Pals.
